creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: large plate with two purple stylized pumpkins among brilliant, jewel toned green leaves; sinuous vines; yellow background with tiny circles; stylized swirling cloud motif on underside with emerald green background
medium: Hizen ware, Kutani type, Aode Kokutani style; porcelain with overglaze enamels
text: 肥前 Hizen ware, 九谷 Kutani type, 青手古九谷 Aode Kokutani style
title: Plate with pumpkins
